document_data.name: The Garden of Rhinda
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Garden of Rhinda''' was a luscious flower garden in [[Darromar]] at the base of and surrounding the [[Ithal Crag]], the large hill upon which the [[Zaranda Star|queen's]] royal palace of [[Faerntarn]] was built.<ref name=LoI1:T-p83/><ref name=LoI1:T-p85>

The garden added color to the otherwise dull [[granite]] of the palace walls. To reach the palace, one had to pass along the winding road up the hill and through the garden.<ref name=LoI1:T-p83/>
